title: What Do the Women Say?
description: Each year, Golden Thread celebrates International Womenâ€™s Day with What Do the Women Say?, a curated evening showcasing the work of leading Middle Eastern women artists. The year 2020's theme is Power, Privilege, and Agency: an artistic exploration of the 100th anniversary of the passage of the 19th Amendment, guaranteeing and protecting \[white] women's constitutional right to vote in the U.S.
